title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, they are non-functional and do not have any effect. This issue is particularly noticeable when opening a small image, such as an icon, where the scrollbars are misleading and do not provide any functionality.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to avoid confusion and misleading behavior.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved. 
3. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect.
